original_title: Re-scrutinized results of Scholarship Exam released
original_body_lines: The re-scrutinized results of the 2022 Grade 5 Scholarship Examination, have been released online, according to the Commissioner General of Examinations Amith Jayasundara.

He said that the results can be obtained by entering the correct index number after logging on to the official websites of the Department of Examinations (www.doenets.lk and www.results.exams.gov.lk).
